name: Bosta WooCommerce
author: Bosta

sections.description:
Bosta’s official extension for WooCommerce on WordPress.

Features

  1. Fast and easy Shipping your orders.
  2. Automatically receive a tracking code for each order.
  3. Bulk Sending Orders allows you to send multiple orders to bosta at once.
  4. Bulk Printing AirWaybill allows you to print multiple airwaybill for bosta orders at once.
  5. Fetching Latest Status From Bosta allows you to tracking your order status from bosta.

Installation & Configuration

  1. Upload the downloaded plugin files to your /wp-content/plugins/bosta-woocommerce directory, OR install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce–>Settings->Shipping and select the upper Bosta unit to configure the plugin.
  4. Add your business APIKEY recived from bosta Support.

short_description: The official Bosta for WooCommerce plugin allows you to automate your e-commerce order process.
description:
Bosta’s official extension for WooCommerce on WordPress.

Features

  2. Automatically receive a tracking code for each order.
  3. Bulk Sending Orders allows you to send multiple orders to bosta at once.
  4. Bulk Printing AirWaybill allows you to print multiple airwaybill for bosta orders at once.
  5. Fetching Latest Status From Bosta allows you to tracking your order status from bosta.

Installation & Configuration

  1. Upload the downloaded plugin files to your /wp-content/plugins/bosta-woocommerce directory, OR install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce–>Settings->Shipping and select the upper Bosta unit to configure the plugin.
